document.full_text: thousands of egyptians took to the streets on friday to push their military rulers to do more to help palestinians following the overthrow of the country's president hosni mubarak.
document.title: egyptians urge rulers to step up palestinian support
lines_and_colors: thousands of egyptians took to the streets on friday to push their military rulers to do more to help palestinians following the overthrow of the country's president hosni mubarak.
